news.headline: 170 Million Users At Stake: Tim Stokely's Zoop Makes Last-Minute TikTok Bid, Promising Creators 'The Lion's Share' Of Ad Revenue
news.summary: Tim Stokely, the founder of subscription content platform OnlyFans, has submitted a last-minute bid to acquire TikTok's U.S. operations. news.headline: Tech’s Problems in China Are Getting Worse. These Companies Are Most at Risk.
news.summary: Apple and Amazon have the most to lose as the trade war heats up. Alphabet and Meta may be the most insulated from trouble.

news.headline: Netflix praised as 'cleanest story' in tech as latest earnings report brushes off macro worries
news.summary: Netflix topped first quarter earnings expectations, reinforcing its position as a defensive standout while competitors grapple with growing economic and industry pressures.
